title: Me and My Work
name: Angelo Gama
summary: I am a developer specialized in Python and C++, currently working at a research foundation in Rio de Janeiro, where I contribute to technological and scientific projects. I study Systems Analysis and Development, constantly deepening my knowledge in programming, software architecture, and development best practices. My journey in the field began curiously by writing automation scripts for the game Tibia. That experience, albeit unusual, awakened my passion for combining creativity, logic, and technology, principles that still guide my work today.
